mapper.select: /* SsoLoginDao.getLogin */ SELECT U.USER_NO , U.LOGIN_ID , U.USER_NAME , U.CLIENT_NO , O.ORGNZ_NAME , O.ORGNZ_DTL_NAME , U.PSTN_CODE , U.DUTY_CODE , U.BSNS_CODE , UA.LOCK_YN , IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND , DATE_ADD(UA.LAST_CHANGE_DATE, INTERVAL UA.AUTH_LIFE_DAY DAY ), NOW()) > 0, 'Y', 'N') EXPIRED_YN FROM GA_USER U INNER JOIN GA_USER_AUTH UA ON U.USER_NO = UA.USER_NO INNER JOIN GA_ORGNZ O ON U.ORGNZ_NO = O.ORGNZ_NO AND U.CLIENT_NO = O.CLIENT_NO AND U.CLIENT_NO = #{clientNo} AND U.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
